title: Welcome!
text:

title: Workshop program
text:
Note



Please note that the program is preliminary and might be subject to change, especially the exact schedule.


All times are in Central European Summer Time (CEST).







Time
Event




10:00 - 10:10
Welcome


10:10 - 10:30
Introduction to Julia & Unfold.jl


10:30 - 11:30
Mass univariate linear models


11:30 - 11:45
Break â˜•


11:45 - 12:45
Continuous predictors & marginal effects


12:45 - 13:45
Lunch break ðŸ¥™


13:45 - 14:45
Non-linear effects


14:45 - 15:00
Break â˜•


15:00 - 16:00
Overlap correction & multiple event types


16:00 - 16:15
Break â˜•


16:15 - 16:45
Lightning talks: UnfoldMakie.jl, UnfoldSim.jl, UnfoldBIDS.jl, UnfoldMixedModels.jl


16:45 - 17:00
Wrap-up





Each lesson consists of a lecture (~ 30min) and a subsequent exercise (~30min).
